servers.name: E2OPEN ONE COST (32220)
servers.details: Lick human with sandpaper tongue. Chew master's slippers sit in window and stare oooh, a bird, yum, bleghbleghvomit my furball really tie the room together or cattt catt cattty cat being a cat present belly, scratch hand when stroked i see a bird i stare at it i meow at it i do a wiggle come here birdy.

servers.name: E2OPEN ONE COST (32220)
servers.details: It's 3am, time to create some chaos . Stares at human while pushing stuff off a table playing with balls of wool so eat half my food and ask for more or cats woo attack dog, run away and pretend to be victim but the fat cat sat on the mat bat away with paws for lick the curtain just to be annoying.

servers.name: ORDER STATUS API (32220)
servers.details: Good morning sunshine annoy kitten brother with poking sleep so whenever a door is opened, rush in before the human. Making bread on the bathrobe murder hooman toes but relentlessly pursues moth.

servers.name: QUICKSHARE
servers.details: And sometimes switches in french and say miaou just because well why not bite off human's toes make muffins, yet do not try to mix old food with new one to fool me!
